content.question:
You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak.

You will have a conversation with Chen Ming, your tour guide in Beijing, about what you would like to do during your stay in Beijing.

Prompt 1

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Make connections among cultural and interdisciplinary information provided in texts.
